TEST_NAME: Column image links should have alt text
QUERY_CLOB:
select a10.pass_yn,
       a10.application_id,
       a10.page_id,
       a10.region_name,
       a10.column_alias,
       a10.report_label,
       a10.column_linktext,
       a10.column_link_attr,
       a10.created_by, 
       a10.created_on, 
       a10.updated_by last_updated_by, 
       a10.updated_on last_updated_on,
       case when a10.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(
                    p_message => q'^Link Column %1, in report %0, is missing an aria-label. 
                    • Report Label/Heading : %2
                    • Link text : %3
                    • Link attributes : %4.
                    • Suggestion : 
                         - remove `alt=""` from the Link Text
                         - add `aria-label="edit #YOUR_COLUMN#"` to the Link Attributes
                    ^',
                    p0 => a10.region_name,
                    p1 => a10.column_alias,
                    p2 => a10.report_label,
                    p3 => a10.column_linktext,
                    p4 => a10.column_link_attr
                    )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a10.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => q'^Column %1 (page %0, app %2) is missing an aria-label attribute^',
                                    p0 => a10.page_id,
                                    p1 => a10.column_alias,
                                    p2 => a10.application_id
                                    )
            end as issue_title,
      a10.component_id,
      a10.parent_component_id,
			a10.workspace
from (
     select 
     case when ic1.column_linktext is null
          then 'Y'
          when ic1.column_linktext like '%.png%'
          then case when ic1.column_linktext like '%alt=""%'
                    then 'N'
                    when ic1.column_linktext not like '%aria-label%'
                    then case when ic1.column_link_attr is null 
                            then 'N'
                            when ic1.column_link_attr not like '%aria-label%'
                            then 'N'
                            else 'Y'
                            end
                    else 'Y'
                    end
          else 'Y'
          end pass_yn,
     ic1.application_id,
     ic1.page_id,
     ic1.region_name,
     ic1.column_alias,
     ic1.report_label,
     ic1.column_linktext,
     ic1.column_link_attr,
     ic1.column_id component_id,
     null parent_component_id,
     coalesce(ic1.created_by, app.created_by) created_by, 
     coalesce(ic1.created_on, app.created_on) created_on, 
     coalesce(ic1.updated_by, app.last_updated_by) updated_by, 
     coalesce(ic1.updated_on, app.last_updated_on) updated_on,
	   ic1.workspace
     from apex_application_page_ir_col ic1
     inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = ic1.page_id
                                           and app.application_id = ic1.application_id
     inner join  v_apex_applications aa on ic1.application_id = aa.application_id
                                        and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
                                        and ic1.column_linktext is not null
	   where ic1.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
) a10
EXPLANATION:
Column image links should have accessible alt text : Link columns in reports that do not feature text (eg, they have the pencil symbol) should include “Alt” text. This alt-text will be displayed by a screen-reader in the web-elements rotor, “links” section. This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  1.1.1(A) : Non-text Content:  
    All non-text content that is presented to the user has a text alternative that serves the equivalent purpose, except for the situations listed below.
FIX: Add some descriptive text to your alt text. You are encouraged to use substitution variables. For eg: ``

TEST_NAME: Region should have Row Header
QUERY_CLOB:
with apx_rl as (
       select case when substr(version_no,1, 2) >= 21
              then 'Y'
              else 'N'
              end compatible_apx_version
       from apex_release
       ),
rpt_cols as (
       select pic.application_id, 
              pic.page_id, 
              pic.region_name, 
              pic.use_as_row_header,
              pic.region_id, 
              'IR' report_type,
              pic.created_by,
              pic.created_on,
              pic.updated_by,
              pic.updated_on,
              pic.column_id,
              pic.workspace
       from v_apex_application_page_ir_col pic
       union all
       select pig.application_id, 
              pig.page_id, 
              pig.region_name, 
              pig.use_as_row_header,
              pig.region_id, 
              'IG' report_type,
              null created_by,
              null created_on,
              pig.last_updated_by,
              pig.last_updated_on,
              pig.column_id,
              pig.workspace
       from apex_appl_page_ig_columns pig 
       union all
       select prc.application_id, 
              prc.page_id, 
              prc.region_name, 
              prc.use_as_row_header,
              prc.region_id, 
              'C' report_type,
              null created_by,
              null created_on,
              prc.last_updated_by,
              prc.last_updated_on,
              prc.region_report_column_id,
              prc.workspace
       from apex_application_page_rpt_cols prc 
       where column_is_hidden = 'No'
),
rpt_cols_fm as (
       select rc.application_id, 
              rc.page_id, 
              rc.region_name, 
              rc.use_as_row_header,
              rc.region_id, 
              rc.report_type,
              apex_string.format(
              p_message => q'^`%0` is missing a row header (App : %1, Page : %2, Region id : %3). Regions that support row headers should have a column with the "Use as Row Header" attribute set to Yes for accessibility reasons.^',
              p0 => rc.region_name,
              p1 => rc.application_id,
              p2 => rc.page_id,
              p3 => rc.region_id
              ) validation_failure_message,
              apex_string.format(
              p_message => '`%0` is missing a row header (app %1, page %2, region id %3)',
              p0 => rc.region_name,
              p1 => rc.application_id,
              p2 => rc.page_id,
							p3 => rc.region_id
              ) issue_title,
              app.created_by,
              app.created_on,
              coalesce(pr.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
              coalesce(pr.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
              rc.column_id,
              rc.workspace
       from rpt_cols rc 
       inner join apex_application_page_regions pr on  pr.region_id = rc.region_id
                                                   and pr.page_id = rc.page_id 
                                                   and pr.application_id = rc.application_id
																									 and coalesce(pr.condition_type_code,'NA') != 'NEVER'
       inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id        = rc.page_id
                                             and app.application_id = rc.application_id
       inner join  apex_applications aa on  rc.application_id     = aa.application_id
                                          and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
)
select case when ar.compatible_apx_version = 'Y'
            then case when count(case when rcf.use_as_row_header = 'Yes'
                                      then 'x'
                                      when rcf.use_as_row_header = 'Y'
                                      then 'x'
                                      end) > 0
                      then 'Y'
                      else  'N'
                      end 
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       rcf.application_id, 
       rcf.page_id, 
       rcf.region_name, 
       rcf.region_id,
       rcf.report_type,
       rcf.created_by,
       rcf.created_on,
       rcf.last_updated_by, 
       rcf.last_updated_on,
       rcf.validation_failure_message,
       rcf.issue_title,
       apr.report_template,
       rcf.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       rcf.workspace
from rpt_cols_fm rcf
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on rcf.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and coalesce(apr.report_template ,'NA') not in ('List Item')
                                             and apr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
cross join apx_rl ar 
group by rcf.application_id, 
         rcf.page_id, 
         rcf.region_name, 
         rcf.region_id,
         rcf.report_type,
         rcf.created_by,
         rcf.created_on,
         rcf.last_updated_by, 
         rcf.last_updated_on,
         rcf.validation_failure_message,
         rcf.issue_title,
         ar.compatible_apx_version,
         apr.report_template,
         rcf.workspace
EXPLANATION:
One or more columns must have "Value Identifies Row" switched on so that screen readers can better describe individual records of a table. This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  1.1.1(A) : Non-text Content:  
    All non-text content that is presented to the user has a text alternative that serves the equivalent purpose, except for the situations listed below.
2.  1.3.1(A) : Info and Relationships : Information, structure, and relationships conveyed through presentation can be programmatically determined or are available in text.
3.  1.3.2(A) : Meaningful Sequence : When the sequence in which content is presented affects its meaning, a correct reading sequence can be programmatically determined.
FIX: At the column level of your report, toggle on “Value Identifies Row” for as many columns is appropriate to uniquely describe the record in human-friendly terms.

TEST_NAME: IG should avoid custom shortcuts
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (select case
                     when lower(trim(javascript_code)) like '%shortcut%' then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
                   javascript_code,
                   application_id,
                   page_id,
                   last_updated_by,
                   last_updated_on,
                   workspace,
                   region_name,
                   interactive_grid_id
            from apex_appl_page_igs)
select aapi.pass_yn,
       aapi.workspace,
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid `%0` (app %1, page %2) is defining a custom shortcut: `%3%`', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.javascript_code) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a custom shortcut', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) issue_title,
       aapi.interactive_grid_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.region_name,
       aapi.javascript_code
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 2.1.4(A) : Character Key Shortcuts : If a keyboard shortcut is implemented in content using only letter (including upper- and lower-case letters), punctuation, number, or symbol characters, then at least one of the following is true: Turn off A mechanism is available to turn the shortcut off; Remap A mechanism is available to remap the shortcut to use one or more non-printable keyboard characters (e.g. Ctrl, Alt, etc); Active only on focus The keyboard shortcut for a user interface component is only active when that component has focus.

TEST_NAME: Application Tabs should avoid tabindex
QUERY_CLOB:
with aat as (select case
                     when (lower(trim(tab_image_attributes)) like '%tabindex%' ) 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                     application_id,
                     tab_image_attributes,
                     last_updated_by,
                     last_updated_on,
                     workspace,
                     build_option,
                     tab_name,
                     tab_id
             from apex_application_tabs)
select aat.pass_yn,
       aat.workspace,
       aat.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aat.last_updated_by,
       aat.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Tab `%0` (app %1) has a tabindex set :`%2`', 
        p0 => aat.tab_name, 
        p1 => aat.application_id,
        p2 => aat.tab_image_attributes) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Tab `%0` (app %1) has a tabindex set', 
        p0 => aat.tab_name, 
        p1 => aat.application_id) issue_title,
       aat.tab_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aat.tab_name,
       aat.tab_image_attributes
from aat
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aat.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aat.application_id
where aat.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 2.4.3(A) : Focus Order : If a Web page can be navigated sequentially and the navigation sequences affect meaning or operation, focusable components receive focus in an order that preserves meaning and operability.

TEST_NAME: Regions with HTML images should have alt text
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case
                     when (coalesce((length(lower(region_source)) - length(replace(lower(region_source),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(region_source)), 0) > 
                                coalesce((length(lower(region_source)) - length(replace(lower(region_source),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(region_source)), 0)) or
                                lower(replace(region_source,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' or
                                lower(region_source) like '% alt %'
                     then 'N'  
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                     to_char(substr(region_source,1,32737)) src,
                     application_id,page_id,region_id, workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions
            where lower(region_source) like '%<img%'
            union
            select case
                   when (coalesce((length(lower(region_header_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_header_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(region_header_text)), 0) > 
                                coalesce((length(lower(region_header_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_header_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(region_header_text)), 0)) or
                                lower(replace(region_header_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' or
                                lower(region_header_text) like '% alt %'
                   then 'N'
                   else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
                   region_header_text,
                   application_id,page_id,region_id, workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions
            where lower(REGION_HEADER_TEXT) like '%<img%'
            union
            select case
                   when (coalesce((length(lower(region_footer_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_footer_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(region_footer_text)), 0) > 
                               coalesce((length(lower(region_footer_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_footer_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(region_footer_text)), 0)) or
                               lower(replace(region_footer_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' or
                               lower(region_footer_text) like '% alt %'
                   then 'N'
                   else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
                   region_footer_text,
                   application_id,page_id,region_id, workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions
            where lower(REGION_FOOTER_TEXT) like '%<img%'
)
select std.pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with no alt text (`%3`)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => substr(std.src,1,50)) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` has an image with no alt text (app %1, page %2, region id %3)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
				p3 => aapr.region_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       std.src,
			 std.workspace
from std
inner join apex_application_page_regions aapr on std.region_id = aapr.region_id
                                              and std.application_id = aapr.application_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where std.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 1.1.1(A) : Non-text Content: All non-text content that is presented to the user has a text alternative that serves the equivalent purpose, except for the situations listed below.
FIX: Add alt text to your image

TEST_NAME: Form Elements should have help text
QUERY_CLOB:
with pproc as (select application_id, page_id, count(1) proc_count
                from apex_application_page_proc
                group by application_id, page_id),
     api as (select case when lower(api.label) in ('username','password')
                         then 'Y'
						             when api.item_help_text is null 
                         then case when api.display_as = 'Checkbox' 
                                   and api.item_label_template in ('Label Top')
                                   then 'Y'
                                   else 'N'
                                   end
                         else 'Y'
                         end pass_yn,
                    api.application_id,
                    api.page_id,
                    api.last_updated_by,
                    api.last_updated_on,
                    api.item_id component_id,
                    api.item_name,
                    api.item_source_type,
                    api.item_help_text,
                    api.display_as,
                    aap.build_option,
                    abo.build_option_status,
                    abo.status_on_export,
                    api.item_label_template,
                    api.label,
                    api.workspace,
                    pproc.proc_count
            from apex_application_page_items api
            inner join apex_application_pages aap on  api.application_id = aap.application_id
                                                  and api.page_id = aap.page_id
            inner join pproc on  pproc.application_id = api.application_id
                             and pproc.page_id = api.page_id
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on  aap.application_id = abo.application_id
                                                               and aap.build_option = abo.build_option_name 
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo2 on  api.application_id = abo2.application_id
                                                                and api.build_option = abo2.build_option_name 
            where api.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
            and api.display_as not in ('Hidden')
            and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') not in ('Exclude')
            and coalesce(abo2.status_on_export,'NA') not in ('Exclude')
            )
select api.pass_yn,
       api.application_id,
       api.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       api.last_updated_by,
       api.last_updated_on,
       case when api.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Item `%0` (page %1, app %2, displayed as `%3`) is missing Help Text. Form items require Help Text.',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id,
                          p3 => api.display_as) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when api.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) is missing Help Text',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id) 
            end issue_title,
       api.component_id,
       api.item_name,
       api.display_as,
       null parent_component_id,
       api.item_help_text,
       api.item_source_type,
       api.item_label_template,
       api.label,
       api.workspace,
       api.proc_count
from api
EXPLANATION:
All editable form elements should have help text. This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  3.3.2(A) : Labels or Instructions:  
    Labels or instructions are provided when content requires user input.
2.  1.3.5(AA) : Identify Input Purpose:
    
    The purpose of each input field collecting information about the user can be programmatically determined when:
    
    The input field serves a purpose identified in the Input Purposes for User Interface Components section; and  
    The content is implemented using technologies with support for identifying the expected meaning for form input data.
    
3.  3.3.5(AAA) : Help : Context-sensitive help is available.

TEST_NAME: List templates should avoid inline CSS w blinking or animation
QUERY_CLOB:
with aatl as ( select case
                      when (lower(trim(inline_css)) like '%blink%'
                            or lower(trim(inline_css)) like '%animation%') 
                      then 'N' 
                      else 'Y'
                      end pass_yn,
                      template_name, 
                      inline_css,
                      last_updated_by,
                      last_updated_on,
                      workspace,
                      list_template_id,
                      application_id
               from APEX_APPLICATION_TEMP_LIST
            )
select aatl.pass_yn,
       aatl.workspace,
       aatl.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aatl.last_updated_by,
       aatl.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('List Template `%0` (app %1) has a CSS animation : `%2`', 
        p0 => aatl.template_name, 
        p1 => aatl.application_id,
        p2 => aatl.inline_css) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('List Template `%0` (app %1) has a CSS animation', 
        p0 => aatl.template_name, 
        p1 => aatl.application_id) issue_title,
       aatl.list_template_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aatl.template_name,
       aatl.inline_css
from aatl
where aatl.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 2.2.2(A) : Pause, Stop, Hide: For moving, blinking, scrolling, or auto-updating information, all of the following are true: Moving, blinking, scrolling For any moving, blinking or scrolling information that (1) starts automatically, (2) lasts more than five seconds, and (3) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it unless the movement, blinking, or scrolling is part of an activity where it is essential; and Auto-updating For any auto-updating information that (1) starts automatically and (2) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it or to control the frequency of the update unless the auto-updating is part of an activity where it is essential.
  2. 2.3.1(A) : Three Flashes or Below Threshold: Web pages do not contain anything that flashes more than three times in any one second period, or the flash is below the general flash and red flash thr~

TEST_NAME: Inline with field error notification is insufficient
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapv as (
        select case  when error_display_location = 'INLINE_WITH_FIELD' 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                application_id,
                page_id, 
                validation_name,
                workspace,
                last_updated_by,
                last_updated_on,
                build_option,
                validation_id,
                error_display_location
           from apex_application_page_val
    )
select aapv.pass_yn,
       aapv.workspace,
       aapv.application_id, 
       aapv.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapv.last_updated_by,
       aapv.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page Validation `%0` (app %1, page %2) error display settings are misconfigured: `%3`', 
        p0 => aapv.validation_name, 
        p1 => aapv.application_id,
        p2 => aapv.page_id,
        p3 => aapv.error_display_location) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Validation `%0` (app %1, page %2) error display settings are misconfigured', 
        p0 => aapv.validation_name, 
        p1 => aapv.application_id,
        p2 => aapv.page_id) issue_title,
       aapv.validation_id component_id,

  1. 1.3.3(A) : Sensory Characteristics : Instructions provided for understanding and operating content do not rely solely on sensory characteristics of components such as shape, color, size, visual location, orientation, or sound.

  3. 3.3.1(A) : Error Identification: If an input error is automatically detected, the item that is in error is identified and the error is described to the user in text.
  4. 3.3.3(AA) : Error Suggestion : If an input error is automatically detected and suggestions for correction are known, then the suggestions are provided to the user, unless it would jeopardize the security or purpose of the content.

TEST_NAME: IG Columns may need autocomplete
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapic as (
    select case
             when (lower(trim(b.item_attributes)) not like '%autocomplete%'
                   or trim(b.item_attributes) is null) 
             then 'N' 
             else 'Y'
             end pass_yn,
           b.application_id,
           b.page_id, 
           b.region_id,
           b.region_name, 
           b.source_expression,
           b.item_attributes,
           b.workspace,
           b.build_option,
           b.last_updated_by,
           b.last_updated_on,
           b.name,
           b.item_type,
           b.label,
           b.heading,
           b.parent_column_id,
           b.column_id
    from apex_appl_page_igs a,
         apex_appl_page_ig_columns b
    where a.application_id = b.application_id
      and b.region_id = a.region_id
      and a.is_editable = 'Yes'
      and b.is_query_only = 'No'
      and lower(b.heading) not like '%api%'
      and (
            (lower(b.heading) like '%name%' and (lower(b.heading) like '%first%' or lower(b.heading) like '%last%' or lower(b.heading) like '%family%'))
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%address%')
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%phone number%')
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%mail%')
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%birthday%' or lower(b.heading) like '%bday%')
         )
  )
select aapic.pass_yn,
       aapic.workspace,
       aapic.application_id, 
       aapic.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapic.last_updated_by,
       aapic.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) may benefit from autocomplete', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) may benefit from autocomplete', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id) issue_title,
       aapic.column_id component_id,
       aapic.parent_column_id parent_component_id,
       aapic.heading,
       aapic.label,
       aapic.item_type,
       aapic.name
from aapic
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapic.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapic.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapic.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapic.application_id
where aapic.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

  1. 2.2.2(A) : Pause, Stop, Hide: For moving, blinking, scrolling, or auto-updating information, all of the following are true: Moving, blinking, scrolling For any moving, blinking or scrolling information that (1) starts automatically, (2) lasts more than five seconds, and (3) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it unless the movement, blinking, or scrolling is part of an activity where it is essential; and Auto-updating For any auto-updating information that (1) starts automatically and (2) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it or to control the frequency of the update unless the auto-updating is part of an activity where it is essential.

TEST_NAME: Classic Columns with images have alt text
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case
                     when format_mask like 'IMAGE%' 
                     then 'N' 
                     when (coalesce((length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))) - length(replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),'<img',null)))/4, length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))), 0) > 
                          coalesce((length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))) - length(replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),'alt="',null)))/5, length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))), 0)) or
                          replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),' ','') like '%alt=""%' or
                          trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)) like '% alt %' 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                   HTML_EXPRESSION src,
                   application_id,application_name,page_id,page_name,region_id,region_name, column_alias,
                   last_updated_by, last_updated_on, build_option, heading, region_report_column_id,
						       workspace
            from apex_application_page_rpt_cols a
            where (format_mask like 'IMAGE%' or
                   trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)) like '%<img%'))
select std.pass_yn,                          
       std.application_id, 
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Classic Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text: `%3`', 
        p0 => std.heading, 
        p1 => std.application_id,
        p2 => std.page_id,
				p3 => std.src) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Classic Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text', 
        p0 => std.heading, 
        p1 => std.application_id,
        p2 => std.page_id) issue_title,
       std.region_report_column_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       std.heading,
			 std.src,
			 std.workspace
from std
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = std.page_id and aap.application_id = std.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = std.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = std.application_id
where std.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 1.1.1(A) : Non-text Content: All non-text content that is presented to the user has a text alternative that serves the equivalent purpose, except for the situations listed below.

TEST_NAME: Page items with html images have alt text
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case
                    when display_as = 'Display Image'
                    then case when attribute_01 = 'DB_COLUMN' 
                              and trim(attribute_03) is null
                              then 'N'
                              when attribute_01 = 'SQL' 
                              and ((coalesce((length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)) - length(replace(lower(html_form_element_attributes),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)) - length(replace(lower(html_form_element_attributes),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)), 0)) 
                                  or lower(replace(html_form_element_attributes,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                                  or lower(html_form_element_attributes) like '% alt %' 
                                  or trim(html_form_element_attributes) is null)
                              then 'N'
                              when attribute_01 = 'URL' 
                              and trim(attribute_02) is null
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end 
                    when lower(item_source) like '%<img%'
                    then case when (coalesce((length(lower(item_source)) - length(replace(lower(item_source),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(item_source)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(item_source)) - length(replace(lower(item_source),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(item_source)), 0))
                              or lower(replace(item_source,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                              or lower(item_source) like '% alt %'
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end
                    when lower(pre_element_text) like '%<img%'
                    then case when (coalesce((length(lower(pre_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(pre_element_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(pre_element_text)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(pre_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(pre_element_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(pre_element_text)), 0)) 
                              or lower(replace(pre_element_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                              or lower(pre_element_text) like '% alt %'
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end
                    when lower(post_element_text) like '%<img%'
                    then case when (coalesce((length(lower(post_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(post_element_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(post_element_text)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(post_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(post_element_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(post_element_text)), 0)) 
                              or lower(replace(post_element_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                              or lower(post_element_text) like '% alt %'
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end
                    else 'Y'
                    end pass_yn, 
                    html_form_element_attributes src,
                    application_id,
                    page_id,
                    item_id,
                    workspace,
                    attribute_01,
                    html_form_element_attributes,
                    attribute_03,
                    attribute_02,
                    item_source,
                    pre_element_text,
                    post_element_text,
                    display_as,
                    html_table_cell_attr_element
                from apex_application_page_items)
select std.pass_yn,                          
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('%4 Page Item `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text (`%3`) [Based on : `%5`, alt text : `%6`]', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => std.src,
        p4 => std.display_as,
        p5 => std.attribute_01,
        p6 => std.attribute_02
        ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) issue_title,
       aapi.item_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.item_name,
       std.src,
       std.workspace,
       std.attribute_01 based_on,
       std.html_form_element_attributes custom_attributes,
       std.attribute_03,
       std.attribute_02 alternative_text,
       std.item_source,
       std.pre_element_text,
       std.post_element_text,
       std.display_as,
       std.html_table_cell_attr_element column_attributes
from std
inner join apex_application_page_items aapi on std.application_id = aapi.application_id
                                            and std.page_id = aapi.page_id 
                                            and std.item_id = aapi.item_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id
where std.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 1.1.1(A) : Non-text Content: All non-text content that is presented to the user has a text alternative that serves the equivalent purpose, except for the situations listed below.

TEST_NAME: IR Columns with images have alt text
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (select case
                     when format_mask like 'IMAGE%' 
                     then 'N' 
                     when (coalesce((length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))) - length(replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),'<img',null)))/4, length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))), 0) > 
                          coalesce((length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))) - length(replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),'alt="',null)))/5, length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))), 0)) or
                          replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),' ','') like '%alt=""%' or
                          trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)) like '% alt %' 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
							     HTML_EXPRESSION src,
                   application_id,page_id,region_id,column_alias,
                   created_by,created_on,updated_on,updated_by, build_option, column_id,
							     workspace
            from apex_application_page_ir_col
            where (format_mask like 'IMAGE%' or
                   trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)) like '%<img%'))
select aapi.pass_yn,                          
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       aapi.created_by,
       aapi.created_on,
       aapi.updated_on last_updated_by,
       aapi.updated_by last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has image with no alt text (`%3`)', 
        p0 => aapi.column_alias, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
				p3 => aapi.src) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has image with no alt text', 
        p0 => aapi.column_alias, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) issue_title,
       aapi.column_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.column_alias,
			 aapi.src,
			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id

TEST_NAME: Page item labels must be unique
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (select row_number( ) over (partition by workspace, application_id,page_id,trim(lower(label)) order by display_sequence nulls last) value_dup_cnt,
                   application_id, 
                   page_id, 
                   item_name,
                   label,
                   display_sequence,
                   build_option, 
                   item_id,
                   last_updated_on,
                   last_updated_by,
							     workspace
              from apex_application_page_items a
             where display_as_code not in ('NATIVE_HIDDEN')
             )
select case
         when (trim(aapi.label) is null
           or lower(trim(aapi.label)) = ' ') 
         then 'N' 
         when value_dup_cnt > 1 
         then 'N' 
         else 'Y'
       end pass_yn,                          
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('There is more than one Page Item `%3` (`%0`) on page %2 (app %1). Page item labels must be unique for accessibility.', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.label) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('There is > 1 Page Item label `%0` (`%3`) on page %2 (app %1).', 
        p0 => aapi.label, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.item_name) issue_title,
       aapi.item_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.item_name,
			 aapi.workspace

inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id

TEST_NAME: Regions on a page must be unique

TEST_NAME: Page Help HTML is well formed

select eba_stds_parser.valid_html_yn(aap.help_text) pass_yn,
       aap.workspace workspace,
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has malformed HTML : `%3`', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id,
        p3 => substr(aap.help_text,1,50)) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has malformed HTML', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
       aap.help_text
from apex_application_pages aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'

Checking for matching HTML tags. This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  4.1.1(A) : Parsing : In content implemented using markup languages, elements have complete start and end tags, elements are nested according to their specifications, elements do not contain duplicate attributes, and any IDs are unique, except where the specifications allow these features.

TEST_NAME: IG Icon View Links need title + aria
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (
        select case when (lower(trim(icon_view_link_attributes)) not like '%aria-%'
                        and lower(trim(icon_view_link_attributes)) not like '%title%') 
                    then 'N' 
                    else 'Y'
                    end pass_yn,
               page_id,
               application_id,
               icon_view_link_attributes,
               workspace,
               last_updated_by,
               last_updated_on,
               region_name,
               interactive_grid_id
         from apex_appl_page_igs
         where icon_view_icon_attributes is not null
    )
select aapi.pass_yn,
       aapi.workspace,
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid `%0` (app %1, page %2) icon view is missing title + aria : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.icon_view_link_attributes) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid `%0` icon view is missing title + aria (app %1, page %2, grid id %3)', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
				p3 => aapi.interactive_grid_id) issue_title,
       aapi.interactive_grid_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.region_name
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 2.4.4(A) : Link Purpose (In Context) : The purpose of each link can be determined from the link text alone or from the link text together with its programmatically determined link context, except where the purpose of the link would be ambiguous to users in general.

                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id

and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 2.2.2(A) : Pause, Stop, Hide: For moving, blinking, scrolling, or auto-updating information, all of the following are true: Moving, blinking, scrolling For any moving, blinking or scrolling information that (1) starts automatically, (2) lasts more than five seconds, and (3) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it unless the movement, blinking, or scrolling is part of an activity where it is essential; and Auto-updating For any auto-updating information that (1) starts automatically and (2) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it or to control the frequency of the update unless the auto-updating is part of an activity where it is essential.
  2. 2.3.1(A) : Three Flashes or Below Threshold: Web pages do not contain anything that flashes more than three times in any one second period, or the flash is below the general flash and red flash thr~

TEST_NAME: Theme styles should avoid animations

       attribute_06,

       attribute_09,
       attribute_10,
       attribute_11,
       attribute_12,
       attribute_13,
       attribute_14,
       attribute_15,
       attribute_16,
       attribute_17,
       attribute_18,
       attribute_19,
       attribute_20,
       attribute_21,
       attribute_22,
       attribute_23,
       attribute_24,
       attribute_25,
       last_updated_by,

       region_column_id,

    )
select aapr.pass_yn,

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

TEST_NAME: Page names should be unique
QUERY_CLOB:
with aap as (select application_id,
                    page_id,
                    lower(trim(page_name)) lower_case_page_name,
                    ROW_NUMBER( ) OVER (PARTITION BY workspace, application_id,lower(trim(page_name)) ORDER BY page_id NULLS LAST) value_dup_cnt,
                    created_by,
                    created_on,
                    last_updated_by,
                    last_updated_on,
                    build_option,
                    page_mode,
                    page_name,
						        workspace
            from apex_application_pages)
select case when aap.value_dup_cnt > 1 
            then 'N' 
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) is not unique. Page names should be unique for accessibility.', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) is not unique', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
			 aap.workspace
from aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

TEST_NAME: Button labels should be unique per page
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapb as (select application_id, 
                     page_id, 
                     label, 
                     workspace,
                     last_updated_by,
                     last_updated_on,
                     build_option,
                     button_name,
                     button_id,
							       button_attributes,
                     dense_rank() over (partition by application_id, page_id, label order by button_id) therank
                from apex_application_page_buttons
						    where label not in ('Reset', 'Cancel', 'Save', 'Delete'))
select case when aapb.therank = 1
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapb.workspace,
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0`/`%3` (app %1, page %2) is not unique [attributes : `%4`]', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.label,
				p4 => aapb.button_attributes) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) is not unique', 
        p0 => aapb.label, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_name,
       aapb.label,
			 aapb.button_attributes
from aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapb.therank = 2
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 2.5.3(A) : Label in Name: For user interface components with labels that include text or images of text, the name contains the text that is presented visually.
  2. 3.3.2(A) : Labels or Instructions: Labels or instructions are provided when content requires user input.
  3. 4.1.2(A) : Name, Role, Value : For all user interface components (including but not limited to: form elements, links and components generated by scripts), the name and role can be programmatically determined; states, properties, and values that can be set by the user can be programmatically set; and notification of changes to these items is available to user agents, including assistive technologies.
  4. 2.4.6(AA) : Headings and labels describe topic or purpose.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 2.2.2(A) : Pause, Stop, Hide: For moving, blinking, scrolling, or auto-updating information, all of the following are true: Moving, blinking, scrolling For any moving, blinking or scrolling information that (1) starts automatically, (2) lasts more than five seconds, and (3) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it unless the movement, blinking, or scrolling is part of an activity where it is essential; and Auto-updating For any auto-updating information that (1) starts automatically and (2) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it or to control the frequency of the update unless the auto-updating is part of an activity where it is essential.
  2. 2.3.1(A) : Three Flashes or Below Threshold: Web pages do not contain anything that flashes more than three times in any one second period, or the flash is below the general flash and red flash thr~

                     then 'N'

             where display_as_code not in ('NATIVE_HIDDEN','NATIVE_CHECKBOX','NATIVE_SINGLE_CHECKBOX', 'NATIVE_RADIOGROUP','NATIVE_YES_NO')
						 and lower(item_name) not like '%api%'
             and (
                    (lower(label) like '%name%' and (lower(label) like '%first%' or lower(label) like '%last%' or lower(label) like '%family%'))
                    or 
                    (lower(label) like '%address%')
                    or 
                    (lower(label) like '%phone number%')
                    or 
                    (lower(label) like '%mail%')
                    or 
                    (lower(label) like '%birthday%' or lower(label) like '%bday%')
                 )
 )
select aapi.pass_yn,
       aapi.workspace workspace,
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('`%3`/`%5` Page Item `%0`/`%4` (app %1, page %2) could benefit from an autocomplete attribute', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.display_as,
        p4 => aapi.label,
        p5 => aapi.display_as_code) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (app %1, page %2) is missing autocomplete', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name,
